title: The Sparky Points

The Sparky Points Rare 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Piercing Electric Blood: When the wielder deals damage using this weapon, they gain 2 Lighting Charges. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When Yrre the Sparkstruck was asked why they'd created a trident twice their size, they simply replied, "The question is - why not create another weapon with spikes like lightning bolts?"
